title: 11-YO Girl Who Lost Her Leg To Cancer Floors Audience With Flawless Kathak Dance Performance
text:
With faith and strong will anything is possible and this 11-year-old girl is showing us just how it's done.

The little girl named Anjali gave an outstanding performance at an annual medical conference at NATCON IASO 2019 in Kolkata.

Facebook

Anjali lost one of her legs to cancer but didn't stop her passion for dance. She danced to Shreya Ghoshal's hit song ‘Mere Dholna Sunn’ from the 2007 film Bhool Bhulaiyaa.

The inspiring video was posted on Facebook by one of the doctors attending the NATCON IASO 2019.

He captioned the video, 'One of the best parts of the Conference. Anjali, who dreamt of becoming a great dancer lost her left leg at the tender age of 11 to cancer. Our treating doctors and nurses Inspired her with the story of Sudhachandran. She fought back to become an outstanding dancer within a couple of years, winning several accolades and hearts.'

Don't Miss 7.2 K SHARES 11.5 K SHARES 3 K SHARES 5.3 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES

'She fulfilled my wishes by performing in the Surgical Oncology Conference Inauguration to this particular Shreya Ghoshal number, sending a strong message to all about how to face Cancer with a grit even at her age. She will remain my inspiration. God bless her...'

Netizens applauded Anjali's grace and will power, one comment read This is just so unbelievably amazing and inspiring! What a brave girl! May God bless her,” another wrote, 'Amazing performance .Hope she will get a prosthetic leg soon and can continue to dance even better.'
description: With faith and strong-will anything is possible and this 11-year-old girl is showing us just how it's done. The little girl named Anjali gave an outstanding performance at an annual medical conference at NATCON IASO 2019 in Kolkata.The inspiring video was posted on Facebook by one of the doctors attending the NATCON IASO 2019.
